About Hotel BT

At BT Hotel, we are committed to creating state-of-the-art facilities and colourful experiences we believe will change the way we live, work and travel.

The BT Hotel was founded by Irish entrepreneur Steven McMillan. The company’s roots lay in Ireland where the McMillan family started building accommodations for The University of Dublin in 1986.

We aim to create the best space where guests can find their purpose and change the world. Not just with the well-designed and thought-out rooms, or the many great shared communal facilities. When we think “best space,” we think of a stimulating environment and an exciting global community.
